import '@liveperson-design-system/components/button';

## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                        | Type                                                                  | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | ---------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `label`   | `label`   | Can be provided as a child element | `string`                                                              | `undefined` |
| `size`    | `size`    |                                    | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"`                                      | `undefined` |
| `theme`   | `theme`   |                                    | `"dark" \| "light"`                                                   | `undefined` |
| `variant` | `variant` |                                    | `"destructive" \| "inline" \| "primary" \| "secondary" \| "tertiary"` | `undefined` |
